subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade saved the Heat with his 42-point effort in Game 3 against the Dallas Mavericks on Tuesday. But he cannot seem to save himself from injuries during the playoffs, which continue tonight in Miami.
snippet: Dwyane Wade saved the Heat with his 42-point effort in Game 3 against the Dallas Mavericks on Tuesday. But he cannot seem to save himself from injuries during the playoffs, which continue tonight in Miami.
